T02D2055:154a-1: yaksh'a nandi ka ri s'a dha nam /
T02D2055:154a-3: gnod spyin dga' byed kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2055:154a-4: gong du na da ku pa ra'i sngags kyi sgrub thabs su /
T02D2055:154a-5: sbyor ba gnod spyin thams cad kyi sgrub thabs ston to //
T02D2055:154a-6: 'on kyang khyad par cung zad bstan par byas na /
T02D2055:154a-7: na ma pri yam kar'a ya ra hi ti she sv'a h'a /
T02D2055:154a-9: dga' byed ces bya ba'i gnod spyin gzhon nu ma cig gis las thams cad byed par 'gyur bas /
T02D2055:154a-10: de'i cho ga ni bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas nas de nas khri stan las byas pa 'am /
T02D2055:154a-11: shing ka tam pa las byas pa'i shing leb la
T02D2055:154a-12: dga' byed ces bya ba zhal gcig phyag drug pa
T02D2055:154a-14: phyag g-yon dang po na shing thog 'dzin pa /
T02D2055:154a-15: gnyis pa mchog spyin gyi phyag rgya can /
T02D2055:154a-16: de'i mdun du rtsva ku sha'i chun po la rang 'dug nas /
T02D2055:154a-17: ba'i sha dang gu gul bsres la stong phrag brgyad
T02D2055:154a-18: spyin sreg byas na grong khyer brgyad rnyed par 'gyur
T02D2055:154a-19: ro // yang de'i mdun du gu gul rkyang pa'i
T02D2055:154a-20: ri lu stong phrag brgyad kyis spyin sreg byas na
T02D2055:154a-21: 'khor stong phrag gcig gis ci 'dod pa'i bza' ba
T02D2055:154a-23: bzlas pa tsam gyis bza' rgyu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2055:154a-24: rtag tu bzlas pas gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
